cutscene.text: There was a knight with no courage...
But after eating a mushroom he found on the forest, [wave amp=50 freq=4]everything started to feel a bit dizzy...[/wave]

[wave amp=50 freq=4]After[/wave] [wave amp=25 freq=4]the[/wave] [wave amp=12 freq=4]dizziness[/wave] [wave amp=6 freq=4]faded[/wave] and [rainbow freq=1 sat=10 val=20]he could see everything in rainbows[/rainbow], he gained courage to continue his quest...
His enemies would [shake rate=20 level=10]tremble[/shake] when they saw him, for he was stronger now!
